post.text: "This job ultimately is not about making fancy speeches. It's not ultimately about public appearances. It's about when nobody's watching and you're alone or in a small group of people and you're making really tough decisions, do you have somebody who's steady? Do you have somebody who has done their homework? It's got to be somebody who recognizes that we all have a part to play, and that's something I'm absolutely convinced Hillary Clinton can do." —President Obama

comment.author: Mikale
comment.text: Excited for today!! Our POTUS campaigning with HILLARY ❤️💙🇺🇸❤️💙🇺🇸 #imwithher #neverTrump

replies.author: Mikale
replies.text: Greg Burright she doesn't take donations. The Clinton Foundation does, they use those donations to give life saving vaccines and AIDS medicines to those that need. I rather they do that, then what Trump does. He willingly does business with Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Dubai and UAE. Trump willingly does personal business with Muslim countries then makes racist comments about Muslims. He's a hypocrite.

replies.author: Mikale
replies.text: I see you're a coward Greg and deleted your comment.
